name: NAIVE_BAYES
desc: Naive Bayes classifier for numerical data (Gaussian NB) and nominal data (Categorical NB).
label: Naive Bayes classifier

parameters.name: x
parameters.label: x
parameters.desc: Independent variables: A list of variables from database.

parameters.name: y
parameters.label: y
parameters.desc: Dependent variable: A categorical variable form database.

parameters.name: alpha
parameters.label: alpha
parameters.desc: Additive smoothing parameter (0 for no smoothing)

parameters.name: k
parameters.label: number of batches
parameters.desc: The number of batches that will be used in k-fold crossvalidation.

parameters.name: pathology
parameters.label: pathology
parameters.desc: The name of the pathology in which the dataset belongs to.

parameters.name: dataset
parameters.label: dataset
parameters.desc: The names of one or more datasets, in which the algorithm will be executed.
